clubs.name: The Daily Pennsylvanian
clubs.head: Director of Tech Department, The Daily Pennsylvanian
desc: Led a team of 4 to build the first iOS & Android mobile app: DP+
Transformed project pages from primitive HTML to modern web frameworks GatsbyJS & NextJS
Co-founded the Tech Department which aims to build a better developer environment

clubs.name: Penn Labs
desc: Utilized university authentication, dining and laundry APIs to build Penn Basics

teaching.name: CIS 455/555: Internet and Web Systems
desc: Grade homework, hold weekly office hours
